text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing bright
Windows down in moonlit night
Feel the magic in the air
Freedom running everywhere

[Verse 2]
Engine hum of pure delight
Speeding fast we're out of sight
Lost in rhythm heartbeats race
Find our dreams no time to chase

[Chorus]
Whoa-oh in the midnight
Shadows dance and take flight
Whoa-oh with the stars so high
Never let this moment die

[Verse 3]
Neon signs are flashing by
Streetlights shimmer in our eyes
Tires spin on empty roads
Chasing tales that life unfolds

[Bridge]
Skyline's calling don't look back
Forward on our endless track
Fading rules we break the mold
Write our story bold and gold

[Chorus]
Whoa-oh in the midnight
Shadows dance and take flight
Whoa-oh with the stars so high
Never let this moment die
title: Midnight Drive
